title: Cheap tablets: 10 of the best deals for under £50, including the Amazon Kindle, and Tesco Hudl
text:
If you're shopping for a tablet, or have been eyeing up a device for a while, you'll know they don't come cheap.
Tablets are growing in popularity fast - the current market leaders are Amazon's Kindle Fire , the Google Nexus , Apple's iPad and the Samsung Tab 4.
But, there are plenty of tablets out there that do exactly the same job - for a fraction of the cost.
If you're after a device to keep the kids busy, to play app store games or to occasionally browse the web - you don't have to splurge £500 on an iPad.
Here's our pick of the best tablets for under £50. Or, if your heart is set on an iPad, see our article on iPad Mini deals here.
For student laptops, see our pick of the 10 best for under £300 .
